Multinomial distribution

use randomkit::{Rng, Sample};
use randomkit::dist::Multinomial;

let mut rng = Rng::new().unwrap();
let d = Multinomial::new(1000, vec![0.25, 0.25, 0.5]).unwrap();
println!("{:?}", d.sample(&mut rng));
